1.text: Set a fine-mesh strainer on top of a pitcher or bowl.

2.text: Pour the juice through the strainer.

3.text: Push the pulp down with a rubber spatula to squeeze out the juice.

4.text: Run the juice through the strainer again to remove additional fibers.

5.text: Secure cheesecloth around the inside of a pitcher with a rubber band.

6.text: Pour the juice slowly into the cheesecloth.

7.text: Squeeze the cheesecloth to remove excess juice from the fibers.

8.text: Rinse out and wash the cheesecloth to clean out the pulp.
